body.name: IBF Industrial Horizontal Bookshelf, Modern 5 Cube Storage Organizer Open Shelf, Low Wide Cubby Bookcase for Home Office Living, Wooden Metal Short Book Shelf Bedroom Storage, Light Grey Oak, 47 Inch
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 20 hrs 18 mins
features: Industrial Touch and Contemporary Design: Bring an industrial touch to your home while enhancing your organizational abilities with this 5 cube storage organizer. Featuring a clean contemporary design, our long cube bookcase uses a compartmentalized design to create a geometric look for your home.

Extraordinary Sturdiness High Stability: 2 sturdy iron frames provide the main support force, and the other 2 metal legs with adjustable footpads in the middle support the additional force while protecting the floor from scratch. The unique angle bracket structure makes the structure of this modern hotizontal bookshelf more stable and balanced, a reassuring design.

Multifunctional and Practical: Whether you choose to use this in your living room as a TV stand, spare bedroom as a storage organizer, study room as a wide bookcase or hallway as a console table, this cube bookshelf will make a practical and stylish addition to your home.

Easy to Install and Clean: This cube storage short bookshelf takes around 30 minutes to assemble. We also provide quite clear instructions, numbered parts, all necessary tools. And the bottom of this industrial bookshelf has enough space to make the robot or vacuum cleaners into clean and vacuum, keep your room clean.
Worry-Free Warranty: We will provide 30 days Money Back Guarantee and 12 Months Warranty. If you have any issue, please contact our professional team to solve your problem. Purchase with worry free.
body.description: IBF Modern 5 Cube Storage Organizer Shelf for Office Bedroom Living Room, Light Grey Oak, 47 Inch Long Indispensable Family Member This wooden wide book shelf can not only be placed in the living room as a modern cube storage TV stand or a wood cube storage shelf, but also can be placed in the entrance as entry table, in addition to the study room as a industrial low bookshelf, various functions to meet all your daily needs! Sure to Satisfy You Customers’ satisfaction and high quality is what we pursue. Any problems during assembly or have any questions about the horizontal Bookshelf, please don't hesitate to tell us.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Since established, IBF has been on a mission to make quality home necessities. DESIGN PHILOSOPHY IBF's design philosophy was to harmonize the living room with all other spaces in the house. Whether it is the chic American kitchen of the 1960s that embodies the rationalism and middle-class concept, or the representative modern collection that promotes the quality of life, the brand is always committed to presenting unique furniture solutions with innovative materials.

IBF Modern 5 Cube Storage Organizer Shelf for Office Bedroom Living Room, Light Grey Oak, 47 Inch Long Indispensable Family Member This wooden wide book shelf can not only be placed in the living room as a modern cube storage TV stand or a wood cube storage shelf, but also can be placed in the entrance as entry table, in addition to the study room as a industrial low bookshelf, various functions to meet all your daily needs! Sure to Satisfy You Customers’ satisfaction and high quality is what we pursue. Any problems during assembly or have any questions about the horizontal Bookshelf, please don't hesitate to tell us. SPECIFICATION Dimensions: 47.2”W x 13.4”D x 30.0”H Inch Material: MDF and Square Steel Tube Finish: Black Powder Coated Paint and Light Grey Oak Weight: 41.47 LBS Package Contents: 1 x cube organizer shelf, 1 x Hardwares, 1 x Instructions

Details of IBF 5 Cube Storage Organizer Bookshelf Industrial Style Wood Grain Clean lines and elaborated oak finish, this dapper-designed rustic short bookshelf strikes a simple silhouette with sturdy metal legs, playing an indispensable role in your home living room space. Extra Angle Brackets The cube bookshelf has 4 simple and chunky angle brackets that connect the top shelf to the metal legs, providing additional support and making the structure stronger. Ample Storage Space Whether to place your books or display decorative items, this 5 cube Organizer is a perfect add on to your existing furnishing. It showcases an open back design complemented with exceptional multiple use storage systems.

Multifunctional and Practical Powerful Support System The support leg below the cubbies storage shelves, which greatly increases its load-bearing ability, and can make more things. High Weight Capacity Metal base and legs provide sturdy support. The top panel of the industrial cube bookcase can hold up to 300 LBS, with ample storage space for your daily needs. Extraordinary Sturdiness High Stability 4 sturdy iron frames provide the main support force, makes the structure of the whole low cube book shelves more firm and stable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for the price!
reviews.reviewText: I love this shelving unit. I was worried it might look cheap, but it looks fantastic. It was super easy to put together - I was able to do it myself in a very short amount of time. It's nice and sturdy, and looks very nice. I endorse this product 100%.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice piece of furniture
reviews.reviewText: Was easy to put together, nice fit and finish and solid as a rock - better than Ikea junk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Manufacturing & designed very well.
reviews.reviewText: Solid and sturdy construction. Looks good, no flaws anywhere. Easy assembly, takes a little time, but everything lined up perfectly. Perfect for electronics, lamps, books and other decor. Great piece of furniture, and the price was good. Due to its being manufactured wood, my guess it’s a veneer over a light weight plywood. It’s not something you can sand down and refinish, but it weighs 59-60 lbs less than solid wood at a much better price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very well made
reviews.reviewText: This is a beautiful piece of furniture. Very well made. It holds up to 300 pounds it claims and it feels like that’s true. Easy to put together

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was impressed by the construction and quality this shelve was made of. All instructions were clear, all precut holes were even, all parts were present. Yes it’s worth the money and serves me well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this shelf!!
reviews.reviewText: The shelf is very sturdy and durable. Very nice looking. My husband said it was not hard to put together. You will have a lot of pieces/parts like screws etc. that you will not use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy directions. Decent product.
reviews.reviewText: Surprised at how nice and sturdy this actually came together. The boards are thick and not flimsy at all. Bought for the boys' room so they can display books, Legos, and all their favorite things. Deep enough for layers of storage and wide enough for the two to share the space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent shelf. Money well spent.
reviews.reviewText: The shelf has braces and gussets in all the right places. It is a very sturdy shelf. The leveling foot at the centerline of the shelf will give extra support if adjusted to be in contact with the floor, this will prevent shelf sagging when heavily loaded.Assembly was a breeze, instructions were clear (study the diagrams as you go, they answer all questions). All parts are clearly labeled. All holes were precise, and all threaded holes were perfect with no stripped threads. I found one bad cam bolt, but multiple spares of all threaded parts are provided in the package. The packaging itself was good and the item arrived un-damaged.I'm going to use the shelf in my music area for music books, headphones, a couple of small guitar amps, cords, laptop, etc. I expect to get many years of use out of this.
